title: Why are people STILL building Yasuo like a tank?
body: I just had a game where our Yasuo rushed sunfire, tabbi, and thornmail. Like what the actual f*ck? Don't people know that build doesn't work anymore?

replies.body: Tank Yasuo rushed Trinity and Frozen Mallet, not armor, armor, and more armor. That shit has never been viable on him.
Because they're stupid. That build is fucking terrible.
